name: Those Memories of Us
description:
A narrative-driven game about a severely ill mother trying to think of better days by experiencing her foggy memories once again.

//Bratislava Game Jam 22 submission

Created by Incidental Minds and Devolution:

Boris Brnčal - Game Director, Writer, & Lead Game Designer

Henrich Achberger - Programmer & Technical Artist

Maroš Seidmann - 3D Modeller & Environmental Artist 

Adam Cmorej -  3D Modeller & Character Designer
